price: Ka ce: "Rũhul ¡udusi* ne ya sassaukar da shi, daga Ubangijinka da gaskiya, dõmin ya tabbatar da waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, kuma (dõmin) shiriya da bushãra ga Musulmi."
arabic: قُلۡ نَزَّلَهُۥ رُوحُ ٱلۡقُدُسِ مِن رَّبِّكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لِيُثَبِّتَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَهُدٗى وَبُشۡرَىٰ لِلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
footnotes: * Rũhul Ƙudusi, watau rai mai tsarki, anã nufin Jibrilu, amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul nazzalahu rūḥu al-qudusi min rabbika bil-ḥaqi liyuthabbita alladhīna āmanū wahudan wabush'rā lil'mus'limīna
